newsitem.title: FINLAND: FORECAST - Finnair '96/97 seen in wide range.
newsitem.headline: FORECAST - Finnair '96/97 seen in wide range.

text.p: A Reuters survey of analysts covering Finnish equities showed a 354 million markka median forecast for Finnish national carrier Finnair's full-year profit before extraordinary items and tax:
Finnair's results are due June 13 in the afternoon.
In the 1995/96 financial year to end-March, Finnair made a 533 million markka profit before extraordinary items and tax.
For the airline's full-year to end-March 1998 profit, eight of the 11 analysts polled gave a median forecast of 407 million markka (mean 423 million) in a 305-540 million markka range. @

Contributors to the survey were Alfred Berg, Aktia Bank, Carnegie Securities, Enskilda Securities, Erik Selin, FIM Securities, Handelsbanken, Interbank, Merita Securities, Opstock Securities and Postipankki.
